description:
High heat kill germs as effectively as disinfectant solution. If chlorine is in short supply, perhaps these grills can serve as the first sterilization unit, and then chlorine solution could be used as the final rinse (and cleaning off of any dirt and debris).

My ideas stem from repurposing items and materials that would be readily available in the affected countries.
summary: BBQ grills (the kind that are used for street food) could be turned into sterilization equipment if chlorine is in short supply. For metal instruments only!
title: Sterilization BBQ grills
